title: Josiah Ober on the Civic Bargain
itunes:title: Josiah Ober on the Civic Bargain
description: How do you solve the question of collective self-government by citizens? Josiah Ober discusses a fundamental problem of democratic societies: how we come to agree on courses of action when we commit to living within a democracy. His argument is that we need to become civic friends, a concept he explains in the conversation.
